Understate: The claim underestimates the actual process of impeachment by stating that it began in 2017 when no formal process had actually begun at that time.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that the impeachment process against President Trump began in 2017.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the establishment of an "Impeach Trump" PAC by Boyd Roberts signifies the beginning of the impeachment process, which is not accurate.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert provides an alternative explanation by stating that the idea of impeachment had been discussed and supported by certain groups, but no formal process had started.
